Christ\92s love for His children is as strong as it is tender. It is a love stronger than death, for He died for us. It is a love more true than that of 
162
a mother for her children. The mother\92s love may change, but Christ\92s love is changeless. \93I am persuaded,\94 Paul says, \93that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord\94 (Romans 8:38, 39).
